Class InventoryDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
fwrp.dao.InventoryDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
InventoryDAO
public class InventoryDAOImpl extends Object implements InventoryDAO
The class implementing the InventoryItem data access object (DAO).
Author:
John Vincent Doce
